attributes.additional_details: The accommodation and conditions at Napier are completely unacceptable even on a temporary basis; it is impossible for the residents to maintain good physical and mental health at the barracks, a situation exacerbated by Covid-19.
attributes.background: Close Napier barracks and transfer residents to appropriate and safe accommodation - flats and hotels across the country where they can safely isolate.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571085
